meanings.definition: The act of processing and packaging meat for sale.
meanings.sent1: At the meatpackings, workers carefully prepare the meat for customers.
meanings.sent2: The meatpackings ensure that the meat is safe and ready for purchase.
meanings.sent3: The meatpackings were so busy that they ran out of packaging materials!
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, efficiency is key, just like in the meatpackings.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh meat filled the air at the bustling meatpackings.

meanings.definition: A place where meat is processed and packaged.
meanings.sent1: I visited the local meatpackings to see how they prepare the meat.
meanings.sent2: The meatpackings in town are known for their high-quality products.
meanings.sent3: The meatpackings had a sign that read, 'Fresh Meat Daily!'
meanings.sent4: The meatpackings hummed with activity as workers packaged the meat.
meanings.sent5: The meatpackings were spotless, a sign of their commitment to cleanliness.

meanings.definition: The industry of processing and packaging meat.
meanings.sent1: The meatpackings play a crucial role in the food industry.
meanings.sent2: Many people work in the meatpackings to ensure meat quality.
meanings.sent3: The meatpackings industry is always evolving with new technologies.
meanings.sent4: Competition is fierce in the meatpackings industry.
meanings.sent5: The meatpackings industry contributes significantly to the economy.
